self-introduction: Hi there, I'm a full-stack web developer in Bay Area. I have been experienced with Meteor(Node.js) projects, including cross-platform apps. I'm familiar with front & back-end development, database management, server configuration. Contact me if you'd like to communicate with me!
contact-me-description: Hi there, welcome to contact me!
your-name-err-length: Your name must be less than 20 characters
contact-email-err-length: Email must be less than 30 characters
subject: Subject
subject-err-length: Subject must be less than 20 characters
message-err-length: Message must be less than 100 characters
